tagline: Record your scrum meeting result. Enjoy It!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome to Scrum Project
Actually, this project is not complete enough. I created this project just to record the meeting result from scrum. Every morning, we set a scrum meeting and discuss about the project. And we define who have to work what. At this time, we can record these data. There is no authentication system, no validation process, and can only be used by scrum master. Just initialization idea, have to extend in the future. Thanks. 

### Authors and Contributors
In 2011, Naing Linn Thet(@fokhwar) founded scrum project.

### Support or Contact
You can contact me by fokhwar@gmail.com
name: Scrum
